column1: Funeral Services will be held on Tuesday
column3: 2015 at 11am at the Rupell Funeral Home
column5: NJ 08865. A visitation of family and friends will be held from 10am until service time at the funeral home. Entombment will take place in Holy Apostle's Mausoleum at the St. Philip & St. James Cemetery; Routes 22 & 519; Phillipsburg
